name: Switch Hit
description: Switch Hit is a free and most fun loving game. It is a fun game in which you have to tap on the platform to switch shapes as quick as possible. Hit with the same shapes and have fun. As you move forward in the game, you will get multiple platforms and game will be more difficult for you. So, Hit the the platform and switch the shapes before they hit you. you can reach us on social media through social media buttons in game play. Play and have fun !!!
